description: I am a Full-Stack engineer, I am passionate about .Net and My goal is to create accessible, user-friendly,robust digital solutions that leaves an impact
detailOrQuote: Working as Full-stack Developer specializing in .NET, Angular and SQL Server. My passion lies in developing efficient web applications, managing SQL databases, and ensuring seamless deployment. I am committed to creating dynamic, scalable, and user-centric web applications using modern technologies.Looking forward to sharpening my skills in a challenging environment. I guarantee enthusiasm in work and fulfilling my projects with inexpressible effort.
